column4: I'm running ubuntu inside vbox and using vlc to play a video. I've a logitech wireless headset and would like to be able to listen to the audio. How can I do this?
i think audio sharing might be available through guest additions?
I do have guest additions installed
any ideas how I can get it to stick to my desktop. My desktop menus do not have any terminal
I only have kde4 and screensavers there
